name: Klorma Draill
content:
Klorma Draill was a female Human, who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War.
Draill was a HoloNet starlet and she also became the mistress of Governor Zerex of the planet Ord Adinorr. When Zerex secured a promotion to become the Moff of the Meridian sector, Draill attended a celebratory party that he held in his mansion, on Ord Adinorr.
